title: Account hacked then banned
body:
So I stopped playing league around the time that Kayne came out, and I just found out today my account was hacked and banned.

I have not shared with anyone the details to my account, and my friend told me he was talking to someone using my account claiming he was a hacker. When I logged on to try to see if this was true, I got the account banned message. From the E-Mail I got, it seems he was using cheats on my account.

As of now, I am banned until Jan 1st, so luckly not perma banned. rip me.

@riot don't know if you will unban me, but i've changed my passwords for email and league incase you do. My email was hacked around the 11th, he's played since then.

replies.body: I went ahead and looked into your account history and it does look like it was most liked compromised, but I'm not 100% sure if that was why the ban was placed or not. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account agents will be able to review everything for you!
